properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM F/V SLEBECH
   IN 09-05.3N 045-29.0W. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
   TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1242/10.
